anya-e1201n:5_0: Akārādayo niggahītantā tecattālīsakkharā vaṇṇā nāma honti, a ā i ī u ū e ऐ o औ ka kha ga gha ṅa ca cha ja jha ña ṭa ṭha ḍa ḍha ṇa ta tha da dha na pa pha ba bha ma ya ra la va sa ha ḷa aṁ;
anya-e1201n:7_0: Tatthādimhi dasa vaṇṇā sarā nāma honti;
anya-e1201n:9_0: Tesu dvedve sarā savaṇṇā nāma honti;
anya-e1201n:12_0: Tesu dvīsu yo yo pubbo so so rassasañño hoti;
anya-e1201n:12_1: tesu e o saṁyogato pubbāva dissanti;
anya-e1201n:14_0: Tesveva dvīsu yo yo paro so so dīghasañño hoti;
anya-e1201n:18_0: Kādayo pañcakā pañca vaggā nāma hontī;
anya-e1201n:20_0: Yvāyaṁ vaṇṇe bindumatto so niggahītasañño hoti; tena kvattho ‘‘niggahītami‘‘. ccādi;
anya-e1201n:22_0: Nāmaṁ pāṭipadikaṁ tassa ante vattamānā ivaṇṇuvaṇṇā jhalasaññā honti yathākkamaṁ; tena kvattho‘‘jhalā ve‘‘. Ccādi.
anya-e1201n:24_0: Itthiyaṁ vattamānassa nāmassante vattamānā ivaṇṇu vaṇṇā pasaññā honti;
anya-e1201n:26_0: Itthiyaṁ vattamānassa nāmassante vattamāno ākāro ghasañeññā hoti;
anya-e1201n:28_0: Ālapane si gasañño hoti; tena kvattho ‘‘ge ve‘‘.Ccādi.
anya-e1201n:31_0: Yaṁ visesanaṁ tadantassa vidhi ñātabbo; ‘‘ato yonaṁ ṭāṭe‘‘. Narā nare.
anya-e1201n:33_0: Sattamīniddese pubbasseva kāriyaṁ ñatabbaṁ; ‘‘saro lopo sare‘‘. Veḷaggaṁ; tamahantīdha kasmā na hoti;
anya-e1201n:33_1: saretopasilesikādhāro tatthetāva vuccate pubbasseva hoti na parassāti.
anya-e1201n:35_0: Pañcamīniddese parassa kāriyaṁ ñatabbaṁ; ‘‘ato yonaṁ ṭāṭe‘‘. Narā nare; idha na hoti jantuyo anantā; idha kasmā na hoti;
anya-e1201n:35_1: osadhyo anantare katatthatāya na vyava hitassa kāriyaṁ.
anya-e1201n:37_0: Parassa sissamānaṁ kāriyamādivaṇṇassa ñātabbaṁ; ‘‘ra saṅkhyāto vā‘‘. Rājinā.
anya-e1201n:39_0: Chaṭṭhiniddiṭṭhassa yaṁ kāriyaṁ tadantassa vaṇṇassa viññeyyaṁ ‘‘rājassi nāmhi‘‘. Rājinā.
anya-e1201n:43_0: Ṭakāro’nubandho yassa so’nekakkharo cādeso sabbassa hoti; ‘‘imassānitthiyaṁ ṭe‘‘. Esu ‘‘nāmhanimi‘‘. Anena.
anya-e1201n:45_0: Chaṭṭhiniddiṭṭhassa ñānubandhakānubandhā ādyantā honti; ‘‘bruto tissīña‘‘. Bravīti, ‘‘bhussa vuka‘‘. Babhuva.
anya-e1201n:47_0: Makāro’nubandho yassa so sarānamantā sarā paro hotī; ‘‘mañca rudhādīnaṁ‘‘. Rundhati.
anya-e1201n:49_0: Dvinnaṁ tiṇṇaṁ vā purisānaṁ sahappattiyaṁ paro;
anya-e1201n:49_1: so ca gacchati tvañca gacchasi, tumhe gacchatha;
anya-e1201n:49_2: so ca gacchati tvañca gacchasi ahañca gacchāmi, mayaṁ gacchāma.
anya-e1201n:51_0: Yo’navayavabhuto saṅketo so’nubandhoti ñatabbo;latupitādīnamāsimhi. Kattā, saṅketaggahaṇaṁ kiṁ?
anya-e1201n:53_0: Vaṇṇasaddo paro yasmā tena savaṇṇo’pi gayhati saṁva rūpaṁ; yuvaṇṇānamño luttā‘‘. Vāteritaṁ, samonā.
anya-e1201n:55_0: Vantvādisambandhiyeva ntu gayhati, ‘‘ntantunaṁ nto yomhi paṭhame‘‘. Guṇavanto; vantvādisambandhīti kiṁ; jantu tantu.
anya-e1201n:58_1: tatrime, saddhindriyaṁ, no hetaṁ, bhikkhunovādo, sametāyasmā, abhibhāyatanaṁ, puttā matthi, asantettha.
anya-e1201n:59_1: so’pi, sāva, yatodakaṁ, tatova; kvavīti kiṁ?
anya-e1201n:61_0: Pubbaparasarā dve’pi vā kvaci na lupyante; latā iva lateva latāva.
anya-e1201n:63_0: Luttā sarā paresaṁ ivaṇṇuvaṇṇānaṁ ño honti vā yathākkamaṁ;
anya-e1201n:63_1: tassedaṁ, vāteritaṁ, nopeti, vāmoru, ateva’ññe, vodakaṁ; kathaṁ paccorasmanti;
anya-e1201n:63_2: yogavibhagā, vātveva tassidaṁ; lutteti kiṁ? Latā iva.
anya-e1201n:65_0: Sare pare ivaṇṇuvaṇṇānaṁ yakāravakārā hontiva yathākkamaṁ;
anya-e1201n:65_1: vyākato, iccassa, ajjhiṇamutto, svāgataṁ, bhavāpanalānīlaṁ; vāttheva-itissa;
anya-e1201n:67_0: Ñonaṁ yavā honti vā sare yathākkamaṁ;
anya-e1201n:73_0: Saramhā parassa byañjanassa kvaci dve rūpā honti; paggaho; saramhāti-kiṁ? Taṁkhaṇaṁ.
anya-e1201n:75_0: Catutthadutiyesu paresvesaṁ catutthadutiyānaṁ tabbagge tatiyapaṭhamā honti paccāsattya;
anya-e1201n:75_1: mahaddhano, yasa tthero, apphuṭaṁ, abbhuggato; esviti-kiṁ? Thero; esantikiṁ?Pattho.
anya-e1201n:77_0: Evasadde pare itissa vo hoti vā; ittheva icceva; eveti-kiṁ,iccāha.
anya-e1201n:79_0: Ñonaṁ vaṇṇe kvaci a hoti vā;
anya-e1201n:79_1: disvā yācakamāgate, akarambhasate,esaattho, esadhammo, maggo aggamakkhāyati, svāyatanaṁ, hiyyattanaṁ, karassu;
anya-e1201n:79_2: vātveva-yācake āgate, eso dhammo; vaṇṇeti kiṁ?So.
anya-e1201n:81_1: cakkhuṁ udapādi cakkhu udapādi, purimaṁjāti purimajāti, kattabbaṁ kusalaṁ bahuṁ.
anya-e1201n:81_3: sāmatthī yenāgamova sa ca rassasarasseva hoti tassa rassānugatattā.
anya-e1201n:85_0: Niggahītamhā parassa sarassa lopo hoti vā kvaci; tvaṁsi tvamasi.
anya-e1201n:87_0: Niggahītassa kho vagge vagganto vā hoti paccā satyā;
anya-e1201n:87_1: taṅkaroti taṁ karoti, tañcarati taṁ carati, taṇṭhānaṁ taṁ ṭhānaṁ, tandhanaṁ taṁ dhanaṁ, tampāti taṁ pāti; niccaṁ pada majjhe, gantvā; kvacaññatrāpi, santiṭṭhati.
anya-e1201n:89_0: Yaevahisaddesu niggahītassa vā ño hoti; yayaññadeva, taññeva, tañbhi; vātveva-yaṁyadeva.
anya-e1201n:91_0: Saṁsaddassa yaṁ niggahītaṁ tassa vā ño hoti yakāre; saññamo saṁyamo.
anya-e1201n:93_0: Niggahītassa mayadā honti vā sare kvaci; tamahaṁ, tayidaṁ, tadalaṁ; vātveva-taṁ ahaṁ.
anya-e1201n:95_0: Ete mayadā cāgamā honti sare vā kvaci;
anya-e1201n:95_1: tivaṅgīkaṁ, ito nāyati, cinitvā, tasmātiha, nirojaṁ, puthageva, idhamāhu, yathayidaṁ, attadatthaṁ; vātveva-attatthaṁ;
anya-e1201n:97_0: Chasaddā parassa sarassa ḷakāro āgamo hoti vā; chaḷahaṁ, chaḷāyatanaṁ; vātveva-cha abhiññā.
anya-e1201n:99_1: Taṁ iminā tadaminā, sakiṁ āgāmī sakadāgāmī, ekaṁ idha ahaṁ ekamidāhaṁ, saṁvidhāya avahāro saṁvidāvahāro, vārino vāhako valāhako, jīvanassa mūto jīmūto, chavassa sayanaṁ susānaṁ, uddhaṁ khamassa udukkhalaṁ, pisi tāso pisāco, mahiyaṁ ravatīti mayūro;
anya-e1201n:101_1: apūccaṇḍakāyaṁ, tacchaṁ, yajjevaṁ, ajjhattaṁ, thañaññaṁ, dibbaṁ, payyesanā, pokkharañño; kvacītveva-ratyā.
anya-e1201n:103_0: Vaggalasehi parassa yakārassa kvaci te vaggalasā honti;
anya-e1201n:103_1: sakkate, paccate, aṭṭate, kuppate, phallate, assate, kvacī tveca-kyāhaṁ.
anya-e1201n:107_0: Hassa vipallāso hoti vā vakāre; bavhābādho bahvā bādho.
anya-e1201n:109_1: dukkaṭaṁ, aṭṭhakathā, gahaṇaṁ, paligho, palāyati, vātveca-dukkataṁ; kvacītveva-sugato.
anya-e1201n:111_0: Saṁyogassa yo ādibhuto’vayavo tassa vā kvacī lopo hoti; pupphaṁsā, jāyate’gini.
anya-e1201n:113_0: Vīcchāyamābhikkhaññe ca yaṁ vattate tassa dve rūpāni honti, kriyāya guṇena dabbena vā bhinne atthe vyāpitu micchā vīcchā;
anya-e1201n:113_1: rukkhaṁrukkhaṁ siñcati, gāmogāmo ramaṇīyo, gāme gāme pānīyaṁ, gehe gehe issaro, rasaṁ rasaṁ bhakkhayatī, kiriyaṁ kiriyamārahate.
anya-e1201n:114_0: Atthiyevānupubbiye’pi vīcchā, mūle thūlā, agge agge sukhumā;
anya-e1201n:114_1: yadi hi ettha mūlaggabhedo na siyā ānupubbiyampi na bhaveyya, (jeṭṭhaṁ jeṭṭhamanuppavesaya) māsakaṁ māsakaṁ imamhā kahāpaṇā bhavantānaṁ dvinnaṁ dehīti- māsakaṁ māsakamiccetasmā vīcchāvagamyate saddantarato pana imamhā kahāpaṇāti avadhāraṇaṁ;
anya-e1201n:114_2: pubbaṁ pubbaṁ pupphanti, paṭhamaṁ paṭhamaṁ paccantīti vīcchāva;
anya-e1201n:114_3: ime ubho aḍḍhā katarā katarā esaṁ dvinnamaḍḍhatā, sabbe ime aḍḍhā katamā katamā imesaṁ aḍḍhatā, ihāpi vīcchāva;
anya-e1201n:114_4: ābhikkhaññaṁ-ponopuññaṁ, pacati pacati papacati papacati, lunāhi lunāhitvevāyaṁ lunāti, bhutvā bhutvā gacchati, paṭapaṭā karoti, paṭapaṭāyati.
anya-e1201n:116_0: Vīcchāmekassa dvitte pubbassa syādilopo hoti, ekekassa, kathaṁ matthakamatthakenāti?
anya-e1201n:118_0: Sabbādīnaṁ vītihāre dve bhavanti pubbassa syādilopo ca;
anya-e1201n:120_0: Turitenāpāyahetupadassanaṁ sambhamo, tasmiṁ sati vattu yāvanteha saddehi so’ttho viññāyate tāvanto saddā payujjante;
anya-e1201n:120_1: sappo sappo sappo, bujjhassu bujjhassu bujjhassu, bhinno bhikkhusaṅgho bhinno bhikkhusaṅgho.
anya-e1201n:122_0: Ayamadhikāro āsatthaparisamattiyā tena nātippasaṅgo iṭṭhasiddhi ca.
anya-e1201n:125_0: Etesaṁ dve dve honti ekānekatthesu vattamānato nāmasmā;
anya-e1201n:125_1: muni munayo, muniṁ munayo, muninā munīhi, munissa munīnaṁ, munismā munīhi, munissa munīnaṁ, munismiṁ munīsu, evaṁ kumārī kumāriyo, kaññā kaññāyoti;
anya-e1201n:125_3: vibhāgo vibhattīti katvā-ettha siamitīkārā kārā ‘‘kimaṁsisū‘‘ti. Saṁketatthā.
anya-e1201n:127_0: Karīyati kattukriyāyābhīsambandhīyatīti kammaṁ, tasmiṁ dutiyā vibhatti hoti;
anya-e1201n:127_1: kaṭaṁ karoti, odanaṁ pavati, ādiccaṁ passati, odano paccatīti-odanasaddato kammatā nappatīyate, kiṁ carahi? Ākhyātato;
anya-e1201n:127_2: kaṭaṁ karoti vipulaṁ dassanīyanti- attheva guṇa yuttassa kammatā;
anya-e1201n:127_4: gāvuṁ payo dohati, gomantaṁ gāvaṁ yāvati, gavamavarundhati vajaṁ, māṇavakaṁ maggaṁ pucchati, gomantaṁ gāvaṁ bhikkhate, rukkhamava cināti phalāni, sissaṁ dhammaṁ brūte, sissaṁ dhammamanusāsati.
anya-e1201n:128_2: yanne vicchitaṁ nāpi anicchitaṁ tatthāpi dutīyā siddhā;
anya-e1201n:128_3: gāmaṁ gacchanto rukkhamūlamupasappati, pathaviṁ adhisessati, gāmamadhitiṭṭhati, rukkha majjhāsateti-adhisīṭhāsānaṁ payoge’dhikaraṇe kammavacanicchā.
anya-e1201n:129_1: taṁ yathā- valāhakā vijjotate, valāhakassa vijjotate, valāhako vijjotate, valāhake vijjotate, valāhakena vijjotateti.
anya-e1201n:130_0: Evamabhinavisassa vā, dhammamabhinivisate dhamme vā, tathā upanvajjhāvasassābhojananavutticanassa;
anya-e1201n:130_4: Tappānācāre’pi kammattāva dutiyā siddhā, nadimpivati, gāmaṁ carati;
anya-e1201n:131_0: Vihitāva paṭiyoge dutiyā, paṭibhantu taṁ cunda bojjhaṅgāti-taṁ paṭi bojjhaṅgā bhāsantūti attho;
anya-e1201n:131_1: yadā tu dhātunā yutto pati tadā tenāyogā sambandhe chaṭṭhī ca tassa nappaṭi bhātīti?
anya-e1201n:131_2: Akkhe dibbati, akkhehi dibbati, akkhesu dibbatītikammakaraṇādhikaraṇavacanicchā.
anya-e1201n:133_0: Kriyāguṇadabbehi sākallena kāladdhānaṁ sambandho accantasaṁyoge, tasmiṁ viññāyamāne kālasaddehi addha saddehi ca dutiyā hoti; māsamadhīte, māsaṁ kalyāṇi.
anya-e1201n:133_1: Māsaṁ guḷadhānā, kosamadhīte, kosaṁ kuṭilā nadī, kosaṁ pabbato; accantasaṁyegeti kiṁ? Māsassa dvīhamadhīte; kosasseka dese pabbato;
anya-e1201n:133_2: pubbanhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā, ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā, imaṁ rattiṁ cattāro mahārājāti;
anya-e1201n:133_3: evamādisu kālavācīhi accantasaṁyegattāva dutiyā siddhā, vibhattivipallāsena vā bahulaṁ vidhānā-
anya-e1201n:134_0: Phalappattiyaṁ kriyāparisamattyapavaggo tasmiṁ viññāya māne kāladdhānaṁ kriyāyāccantasaṁyoge tatiyābhimatā sāpi karaṇattāva siddhā;
anya-e1201n:134_2: anapavaggetu asādhakatamattā karaṇattābhave dutiyāva māsamadhīto’nuvāko, na cānena gahitoti.
anya-e1201n:135_0: Kārakamajjhe ye kāladdhānavācino tato sattamīpapañcamiyo abhimatā;
anya-e1201n:135_1: ajja bhutvā devadatto dvīhe bhuñjissati dvīhā bhuñjissati, atraṭṭho’yamissāso kose lakkhaṁ vijjhati, kosā lakkhaṁ vijjhatīti-tāpīha sakasakakārakavacanicchāyeva siddhā.
anya-e1201n:137_0: Gamanatthānaṁ bodhatthānaṁ āhāratthānaṁ saddatthānamakammakānaṁ bhajjādīnañca payojje kattari dutiyā hoti, sāmatthiyā ca payojakavyāpārena kammatāvassa hotīti patīyate;
anya-e1201n:137_1: gama yati māṇavakaṁ gāmaṁ, yāpayati māṇavakaṁ gāmaṁ, bodhayati māṇavakaṁ dhammaṁ, vedayati māṇavakaṁ dhammaṁ, bhojayati māṇavakamodanaṁ, āsayati māṇavakamodanaṁ, ajjhāpayati māṇavakaṁ vedaṁ pāṭhayati māṇavakaṁ vedaṁ, āsayati devadattaṁ, sāyayati deva dattaṁ, aññaṁ bhajjāpeti, aññaṁ koṭṭāpeti, añaññaṁ santharāpeti.
anya-e1201n:137_3: paye ppoti kiṁ?Gacchati devadatto, yadā carahigamayati devadattaṁ yañña datto, tamaparo payojayati tadā gamayati devadattaṁ yaññadatteneti - bhavitabbaṁ gamayatissāgamanatthattā.
anya-e1201n:139_0: Harādīnaṁ payojje kattari dutiyā hoti vā;
anya-e1201n:139_1: hāreti hāraṁ devadattaṁ devadatteneti vā, ajjhohāreti sattuṁ devadattaṁ devadatteneti vā, kāreti devadattaṁ devadatteneti vā, dassayate janaṁ rājā janeneti vā, abhivādayate guruṁ devadattaṁ devadatteneti vā.
anya-e1201n:141_0: Khādādīnaṁ payojje kattari dutiyā na hoti;
anya-e1201n:141_1: khādayati devadattena, ādayati devadattena, avhāpayati devadattena, saddāyati devadattena, kandayati devadattena, nāyayati devadattena.
anya-e1201n:145_0: Bhakkhayati modake devadattena; ahiṁsāyanti kiṁ? Bhakkhayati balivadde sassaṁ.
anya-e1201n:147_1: Dhiratthumaṁ pūtikāyaṁ, antarā ca rājagahaṁ, antarā ca nāḷandaṁ, samādhānamantarena, mucalindamabhito saramiccādi-chaṭṭhiyāpavādo yaṁ.
anya-e1201n:149_1: rukkha mabhivijjetate vijju, sādhu devadatto mātaramabhi, rukkhaṁ rukkhamabhitiṭṭhati.
anya-e1201n:151_0: Patiparīhi yuttamhā lakkhaṇādisu bhāge vatthe dutiyā hoti;
anya-e1201n:151_1: rukkhampati vijjotate vijju, sādhu devadatto mātaraṁ pati, rukkhaṁ rukkhaṁ pati tiṭṭhati, yadettha maṁ pati siyā, rukkhaṁ parivijjetate vijju, sādhu devadatto mātaraṁ pari, rukkhaṁ rukkhaṁ pari tiṭṭhati, yadettha maṁ pari siyā.
anya-e1201n:153_2: hetu ca lakkhaṇaṁ bhavati, sādhu devadatto mātaramanu, rukkhaṁ rukkhamanu tiṭṭhati, yadettha maṁ anusiyā.
anya-e1201n:157_0: Hīnatthe’nunā yuttamhā dutiyā hoti; anusāriputtaṁ paññāvanto.
anya-e1201n:160_0: Hinatthe upena yuttamhā dutiyā hoti; upasāriputta paññāvanto.
anya-e1201n:162_0: Ādhikyatthe upena yuttamhā sattamī hoti; upakhārayaṁ doṇo.
anya-e1201n:166_0: Kattari karaṇa cैa kārake tatiyā hoti;
anya-e1201n:166_1: purisena kataṁ, asinā chindati, pakatiyābhirūpo, gottena gotamo’sumedho nāma nāmena, jātiyā sattavassikoti-bhūdhātussa sambhavā karaṇe eva tatiyā;
anya-e1201n:166_2: evaṁ samena dhāvati, visamena dhāvati, dvidoṇena dhaññaṁ kiṇāti, pañcakena pasavo kiṇātīti.
anya-e1201n:170_1: tidaṇḍakena paribbājakamaddakkhi, akkhinā kāṇo, tena hi aṅgena aṅgino vikāro lakkhīyate.
anya-e1201n:172_0: Takkiriyāyogge tatiyā siyā; annena vasati, vijjāya yaso.
anya-e1201n:174_0: Iṇe hetumhī pañcamī hoti vā;jaḷattā baddho satena vā.
anya-e1201n:176_1: jaḷattā baddho jaḷattena vā, paññāya mutto, hutvā abhāvato’niccā, saṅkhāra nirodhā viññāṇanirodho.
anya-e1201n:180_0: Hetvatthehi yoge sabbādīhi sabbā vibhattiyo honti;
anya-e1201n:180_1: ko hetu, kaṁ hetuṁ, kena hetunā, tassa hetussa, kasmā hetusmā, kassa hetussa, kasmiṁ hetusmiṁ; kiṁ kāraṇaṁ, kena kāraṇena; kiṁ nimittaṁ, kena nimittena;
anya-e1201n:182_0: Yassa sammā padīyate tasmiṁ catutthi siyā;
anya-e1201n:182_1: saṅghassa dadāti, ādhāravicakkhāyaṁ sattamīpi siyā, saṅghe dehi.
anya-e1201n:184_0: Tassedaṁ tadatthaṁ tadatthabhāve jotanīye nāmasmā catutthī siyā;
anya-e1201n:184_1: sītassa paṭighātāya, atthāya hitāya devamanussānaṁ, nālaṁ dārabharaṇāya, yūpāya dāru, pākāya vajatītvevamādi.
anya-e1201n:185_0: Kassa sāduṁ na ruccati, mā āyasmantānampi saṅghabhedo ruccattha, khamati saṅghassa, bhattamassa nacchādetīti-chaṭṭhī sambandha vacanicchāyaṁ;
anya-e1201n:185_1: na cevaṁ virodho siyā sadisarūpattā evaṁ vidhesu ca sambandhassa saddikānumatattā kassa vā tvaṁ dhammaṁ rocesīti-atthamatte paṭhamā.
anya-e1201n:187_0: Rañño sataṁ dhāreti, rañño chattaṁ dhāretīti sambandhe chaṭṭhī;
anya-e1201n:187_1: evaṁ rañño silāghate, rañño hanute, rañño upa tiṭṭhate, rañño sapate, devāpi tassa pihayanti tādino, tassa kujjha mahāvīra, yaditaṁ tassa pakuppeyyaṁ, dubhayati disānaṁ megho, yo mittānaṁ na dūhatī,[ ] yo appaduṭṭhassa narassa dussati, kyāhaṁ ayyānaṁ aparajjhāmi, issayanti samaṇānaṁ titthiyā, dhammena nayamānānaṁ kā usūya, [ ] rañño bhāgyamā rajjhati, rañño bhāgyamikkhate, tena yācito ayācito vā tassa gāvo paṭisuṇāti, gāvo āsuṇāti, bhagavato paccassosuṁ, hotu patigiṇāti, hotvanugiṇāti, ārovayāmi vo, pativedayāmi vo, dhamma te desissāmi, yathā no satthā vyākareyya, alaṁ te idha vāsena, kiṁ te jaṭāhi dummedha, arahati mallo mallassāti –jīvitaṁ tiṇāyapi na maññamanoti tādatthye catutthi;
anya-e1201n:188_0: ‘‘Yo ca sitaca uṇhaca tiṇā bhiyyo na namaññati‘‘
anya-e1201n:189_1: saggāya gacchatīti-tādatthye catutthi, yo hi saggaṁ gacchati tadatthaṁ tassa gamananti–-kammavavanicchāyaṁ tu dutiyāva - saggaṁ gacchati;
anya-e1201n:189_2: āyuṁ bhoto hotu, ciraṁ jīvitaṁ bhaddaṁ kalyāṇaṁ atthaṁ payojanaṁ kusalaṁ anāmayaṁ hitaṁ pathyaṁ sukhaṁ sātaṁ bhoto hotu;
anya-e1201n:189_3: sādhu sammuti metassa, puttassāvikareyya guyhamatthaṁ, tassa me sakko pāturahosi, tassa pahiṇeyya, bhikkhūnaṁ dūtaṁ pāhesi, kappati samaṇānaṁ āyogo, ekassa dvinnaṁ tiṇṇaṁ vā pahoti, upamaṁ te karissāmi, añjaliṁ te pagaṇhāmi, tassa phāsu, lokassattho, namo te purisājañña, sotthi tassa, alaṁ mallo mallassa, samattho mallo millassa, tassa hitaṁ tassa sukhaṁ, svāgataṁ te mahārājāti-sabbattha chaṭṭhī sambandhe.
anya-e1201n:192_1: gāmasmā āgacchati evaṁ corasmā bhāyati, corasmā uttasati, corasmā tāyati corasmā rakkhatīti.
anya-e1201n:193_0: Savebhāyatha dukkhassa, pamāde bhayadassivā tasanti daṇḍassāti,-chaṭṭhisattamiyo’pi honteva sambandhādhāravavanicchāyaṁ ajjhenā parājeti, paṭipakkhe parājetīti-savīsayāva vibhattiyo;
anya-e1201n:193_1: sace kevaṭṭassa parajjissāmīti- chaṭṭhīpi hoti sambandhavavanicchāyaṁ, yavehi gāvo vāreti, pāpā cittaṁ nivāraye, kāke rakkhati taṇḍulāti-savisayeva pañcamī?
anya-e1201n:193_6: himacantā pabhavati gaṅgā, pāṇātipātā viramassu khippaṁ, añño devadattā, bhinno devadattāti-samisayeva pañcamī;
anya-e1201n:193_8: evaṁ ārā so [ ] āsavakkhayā, itaro devadattā, uddhaṁ pādatalā, adho kesamatthakā, pubbo gāmā, pubbeva sambodhā, tato paraṁ, tato aparena samayena, tatuttarinti, sambandha vacanicchāyaṁ chaṭṭhīpi;
anya-e1201n:193_9: purato gāmassa, dakkhiṇato gāmassa, upari pabbatassa, heṭṭhā pāsādassāti;pāsādamāruyha pekkhati, pāsādā pekkhati, āsane upavisitvā pekkhati āsanā pekkhatīti-avadhi vacanicchāyaṁ pañcamī; pucchanakhyānesupi;
anya-e1201n:193_10: kuto bhavaṁ, pāṭaliputta smāti; tathā desakālamāne’pi;
anya-e1201n:193_11: pāṭaliputtasmā rājagahaṁ satta yojanāni sattasu yojanesūti vā;
anya-e1201n:193_14: kacchena me adhi gatanti hetumhi karaṇe vā tatiyā;
anya-e1201n:193_15: evaṁ thokā mutto, tho kena muttoti, thokaṁ valatīti-kriyāvisesane kammani dutiyā;
anya-e1201n:193_17: dūraṁgāmasmā, antikaṁ gāmasmā, dūraṁ gāmassa, antikaṁ gāmassāti-dūranti katthe hī tu sabbāva savisaye siyuṁ bādhakābhāvā;
anya-e1201n:193_19: keci panāhu asattavacanehetehi pāṭipadikatthe dutiyātatiyāpañcamīsattamiyo sattavacanehi tu sabbāva savisayeti; te panaññeheva paṭikkhittā;
anya-e1201n:193_20: dūraṁ maggo, antikaṁ maggoti- kriyāvisesanaṁ bhudhātussa gamma mānattā;
anya-e1201n:193_21: suddho lobhanīyehi dhammehi, parimutto dukkhasmā, vivicceva kāmehi, gambhīrato ca puthulato ca yojanaṁ, āyāmena yojanaṁ, tatoppabhuti, yato sarāmi attānantī-savisayeva vibhattiyo.
anya-e1201n:195_0: Vajjane vattamānehi apaparīhi yoge pañcamī hoti;
anya-e1201n:195_1: apasālāya āyanti vāṇijā, parisālāya āyanti vāṇijā, sālaṁ vajjetvāti attho; vajjaneti kiṁ?
anya-e1201n:195_2: Rukkhaṁ parivijjotate vijju, āpāṭaliputtasmā vassi devoti-mariyādābhividhimhiyeva pañcama, vinā pāṭalaputtena saha veti-viseso;
anya-e1201n:197_0: Paṭinidhimhi paṭidāne ca vattamānena patinā yoge nāmasmā pañcamī vibhatti hoti;
anya-e1201n:197_1: buddhasmā pati sāriputto, ghatamassa telasmā pati dadāti, paṭinidhipaṭidānesūti-kiṁ? Rukkhaṁ pati vippotate.
anya-e1201n:199_0: Rite saddena yoge nāmasmā dutiyā hoti pañcamī ca rite saddhammaṁ, rite saddhammā.
anya-e1201n:201_0: Vināññatrasaddehi yoge nāmasmā tatiyā ca hoti, dutiyāpañcamiyo ca;
anya-e1201n:201_1: vinā vātena, vinā vātaṁ, vinā vātasmā, aññatra ekena piṇḍapātanīhārakena, aññatra dhammaṁ, aññatra dhammā.
anya-e1201n:203_0: Etehi yoge tatiyā hoti pañcamī ca;
anya-e1201n:203_1: puthageva janena, puthageva janasmā, janena nānā, jasanmā nānā.
anya-e1201n:205_0: Kriyādhārabhutakattukammānaṁ dhāraṇena yo kriyāyādhāro tasmiṁ kārake nāmasmā sattami hoti;
anya-e1201n:205_1: kaṭe nisīdati, thāliyaṁ odanaṁ pacati, ākāse sakuṇā, tilesu telaṁ, gaṅgāyaṁ vajo.
anya-e1201n:207_1: ajinamhi haññate dīpi, musā vāde pācittiyaṁ.
anya-e1201n:209_0: Yassa bhāvo bhāvantarassa lakkhaṇaṁ bhavati tato sattamī hoti;
anya-e1201n:209_1: gāvīsu duyhamānāsu gato, duddhāsu āgato; bhāvoti kiṁ? Yo jaṭāhi sa bhuñjati;
anya-e1201n:209_3: Akāle vassati tassa, kāle tassa na vassatīti-visayasattamī.
anya-e1201n:211_0: Yassa bhāvo bhāvantarassa lakkhaṇaṁ bhavati tato chaṭṭhī bhavati sattamī cānādare gamyāne.
anya-e1201n:214_0: Gunnaṁ sāmīti-sambandhe chaṭṭhī, geṁsu sāmīti visayasattamī, evaṁ gunnamissaro gosissaro, gunnaṁ adhipati gosu adhipati, gunnaṁ dāyādo gosu dāyādo gunnaṁ sakkhi gosu sakkhi, gunnaṁ patibhu gosupatibhu, gunnaṁ pasūto gosu pasūto, kusalā naccagītassa kusalā naccagīte, āyutto kaṭakaraṇassa āyutto kaṭakaraṇe, tathādhāravacanicchāyaṁ pattamī;
anya-e1201n:214_1: bhikkhusu abhivādenti, muddhani cumbitvā, bāhāsu gahetvā, hatthesu piddhāya caranti, pathesu gacchanti, kadalīsu gaje rakkhantīti;
anya-e1201n:216_0: Jātiguṇakriyāhi samudāyatekadesassa puthakkaraṇaṁ niddhāraṇaṁ yato taṁ karīyati tato chaṭṭhīsattamiyo honti;
anya-e1201n:216_1: sāliyo sūkadhaññānaṁ pathyatamā sāliyo sūkadhaññesu pathya tamā,kaṇbhā gāvīnaṁ sampannakhīratamā kaṇhā gāvīsu sampanna khīratamā, gacchataṁ dhāvanto sīghatamā gacchantesu dhāvanto sīghatamā –- sīlameva sutā seyyoti-avadhimhiyeva pañcamī.
anya-e1201n:218_1: rukkho, itthi, pumā napuṁsakanti-liṅgampi saddotthova, tathā doṇo, khārī āḷahakanti-parimāṇampi saddatthova, eko, dve, bahavoti-saṁkhyyāpi saddatthova.
anya-e1201n:220_0: Yato saddenābhimukhīkaraṇamāmantaṇaṁ tasmiṁ visaye paṭhamā vibhatti hoti;
anya-e1201n:220_1: bho purisa, bho itthi, bho napuṁsaka. Chaṭṭhī sambandhe-.
anya-e1201n:221_0: Kriyākārakasañjāto assedambhāvahetuko sambandho nāma tasmiṁ chaṭṭhīvibhatti hoti;
anya-e1201n:221_1: rañño puriso, sarati rajjassāti- sambandhe kṭṭhī, rajajjasambandhiniṁ satiṁ karotīti attho;
anya-e1201n:221_3: sarati rajjaṁ, tathā rajakassa vatthaṁ dadāti, paharatopiṭṭhiṁ dadāti pūrati bālo pāpassa,
anya-e1201n:223_0: Divasassa tijhattuṁ, sakiṁ pakkhassa, pūraṁ hiraññasuvaṇṇassa kumbhiṁ tvevamādi.
anya-e1201n:224_1: sādhu sammato bahujanassa, suppaṭividdhā buddhānaṁ dhammadhātu, dhammassa gutto medhāvī, amataṁ tesaṁ paribhuttaṁ, tassabhavanti vattāro, avisaṁvādako lokassa, alajjīnaṁ nissāya, catunnaṁ mahābhūtānaṁupādāya pasādotvevamādi;
anya-e1201n:224_2: kattukamma vacanicchāyantu tatiyādutiyāyova sañcatto pitarā ahaṁ, sarasi tvaṁ evarūpiṁ vācā bhāsitā, bhagavantaṁ dassanāyatthemādi.
anya-e1201n:226_0: Tulyatthena yoge chaṭṭhī hoti tatiyā vā; tulyo pitu, tulyo pitarā;
anya-e1201n:226_1: sadiso pitu, sadiso pitarā –-iha kathaṁ tatiyayā na hoti;
anya-e1201n:226_2: ajjunassa tulā natthi, kesavassupamā nacetinete lyatthā kiṁ carahi; tulyānamopammatthā.
anya-e1201n:228_0: Akārantato nāmasmā yonaṁ ṭāṭe honti yathākkamaṁ ṭakārā sabbādesatthā; buddhā, buddhe, atoti-kiṁ?
anya-e1201n:228_1: Kaññāyo itthiyo, vadhuyo –- idha kasmā na bhavati aggayo, avidhāna sāmatthiyā.
anya-e1201n:230_0: Kārantato nāmasmā nīnaṁ ṭāṭe vā honti yathākka maṁ; rūpā, rūpe, rūpāni; atottheva-aṭṭhīni.
anya-e1201n:232_0: Akārantato nāmasmā smāsminnaṁ ṭāṭe vā honti yathākkamaṁ;
anya-e1201n:232_1: buddhā, buddhasmā, buddhe, buddhasmiṁ; atotveva-aggīsmā aggismiṁ.
anya-e1201n:234_0: Akārantato parassa sassa catutthiyā āyo hoti vā;
anya-e1201n:234_1: buddhāya, buddhassa, bhiyyo tādatthyeyevāyamāyo dissate kvavi devaññattha; atotveva-isissa; catutthiyāti-kiṁ?
anya-e1201n:235_0: ‘‘Asmā lokā paramhā ca ubhayā dhaṁsate naro‘‘tyāhaṁ mante paratthaddho;
anya-e1201n:239_0: Ghapasaññehi tetimāmūhi nādīnamekasmiṁ ssā vā hoti;
anya-e1201n:239_1: tassā kataṁ, tassā dīyate, tassā nissaṭaṁ, tassā pariggaho, tassā patiṭṭhitaṁ, tāya vā;
anya-e1201n:239_2: evaṁ etissā, etāya, imissā, imāya, amussā, amuyā; etehīti-kiṁ?
anya-e1201n:241_0: Dvādīnaṁ sattarasannaṁ saṁkhyānaṁ nuka hoti namhi vibhattimhi;
anya-e1201n:241_1: dvinnaṁ, catunnaṁ, pañcannaṁ, evaṁ yāva aṭṭhārasannaṁ;
anya-e1201n:241_2: ukāro uccāraṇattho, kakāro antāvayavattho, tenanamhi na dīgho.
anya-e1201n:243_0: Namhi bahuno katissa ca sukaka hoti? Bahunnaṁ, katinnaṁ.
anya-e1201n:251_1: itarissaṁ, itarissā, ekissaṁ, ekissā, aññassaṁ, aññassā, etissaṁ, etissāya, imissaṁ, imissā, imassāya; esviti-kiṁ? Itarāya, esanti-kiṁ? Sabbassaṁ, sabbassā.
anya-e1201n:253_1: tissaṁ, tassaṁ, tissā, tassā, tissāya, tassāya; ssaṁssāssāyesvitveva-tāya.
anya-e1201n:255_1: tassāya, tāya, etissāya, etāya, imissāya, imāya.
anya-e1201n:261_0: Latuppaccayantānaṁ pitādīnañcā hoti simhi; kattā pitā;
anya-e1201n:261_1: pitu mātu bhātu dhītu duhitu jāmātu nattu hotu potu.
anya-e1201n:263_0: Latupitādīnaṁ a hoti ge ā ca;
anya-e1201n:263_1: bho katta, bho kattā, bho pita, bho pitā.
anya-e1201n:265_0: A i u iccesaṁ vā dīgho hoti ge pare tiliṅge;
anya-e1201n:265_1: bho purisā, bho purisa, bho aggī, bho aggi, bho bhikkhū, bho bhikkhū.
anya-e1201n:267_0: Ghato brahmādito ca gasse vā hoti;
anya-e1201n:267_1: hoti kaññe, hoti kaññā, bho brahme, bho brahma, bho katte, bho katta,bho ise, bho isi, bho sakhe, bho sakha –- sakhi sakhīti-itthiyaṁ siddhameva; ākatigaṇoyaṁ; evamaññatrāpi.
anya-e1201n:269_0: Ammādīhi gassena hoti; bhoti ammā; bhoti annā, bhoti ambā.
anya-e1201n:271_0: Ammādīnaṁ ge rasso hoti vā; bhoti amma, bhoti ammā.
anya-e1201n:273_1: tassaṁ, tassā, tassāya, taṁ, sabhatiṁ –-esviti-kiṁ? Tāya, sahāya.
anya-e1201n:275_0: Ekavacane yosuva ghaokārantavajjitānaṁ nāmānaṁ rassohoti tiliṅge;
anya-e1201n:275_1: itthiṁ, itthiyā, itthiyo, vadhuṁ, vadhuyā, vadhuyo;
anya-e1201n:275_2: daddhiṁ, daddhinā, daddhino, sayambhuṁ, sayamabhunā, sayamabhuvo –- aghonanti-kiṁ? Kaññāya, kaññāyo; oggahaṇamuttaratthaṁ.
anya-e1201n:277_0: Aghonaṁ ge vā rasso hoti tiliṅge?Itthi, itthi, vadhu, vadhu,daddhi, daddhī, sayambhu, sayambhu –- aghonaṁtveva-hoti kaññā, bho go.
anya-e1201n:279_0: Napuṁsakavajjitassa nāmassa sismiṁ rasso na hoti.
anya-e1201n:279_1: Itthi, daddhī, vadhū, sayambhu –-sisminti-kiṁ?Itthiṁ, anapuṁsakassāti-kiṁ. Daddhi, kulaṁ.
anya-e1201n:281_0: Gasihinaṁ cajjitāsu vibhattisu gosaddassa gāvagavā honti;
anya-e1201n:281_1: gāvo, gavo, gāvena, gavena, gāvassa, gavassa, gāvasmā, gavasmā, gāve, gave; agasihinaṁsūti-kiṁ?
anya-e1201n:281_2: Bho go go tiṭṭhati, gohi, gonaṁ.
anya-e1201n:283_0: Gossa sumhi gāvagavā honti vā; gāvesu, gavesu, gosu.
anya-e1201n:285_0: Gossa se vā gavaṁ hoti saha sena; gavaṁ, gāvassa, gavassa.
anya-e1201n:287_0: Naṁvacanena saha gossa gunnaṁ hoti gavañca vā; gunnaṁ, gavaṁ, gonaṁ.
anya-e1201n:289_0: Goto nāssa ā hoti vā; gāvā, gavā, gāvena, gavena.
anya-e1201n:291_1: gāvuṁ, gāvaṁ, gavaṁ–-gossa goṇādeso na kato saddantarattā.
anya-e1201n:295_0: Jhasaññīto aṁvacanassa naṁ vā hoti; daddhinaṁ, daddhiṁ–- kathaṁ?
anya-e1201n:297_0: Jhito yonaṁ none vā honti yathākkamaṁ pulliṅge, daddhino, daddhine, daddhī–-jhītotveva aggī; pumeti-kiṁ?Daddhīni, kulāni.
anya-e1201n:299_0: Jhito yonaṁ no vā hoti pulliṅge;
anya-e1201n:299_1: daddhino tiṭṭhanti, daddhino passa, daddhī vā.
anya-e1201n:303_1: phalaṁ patati ambuni,’padumaṁ yathā paṁsuni ātape kataṁ’, vātveva-ambumha, paṁsumhi.
anya-e1201n:305_0: Kammādito smino ni hoti vā; kammanī, kamme;
anya-e1201n:305_1: kamma camma vesma bhasma brahma atta ātuma ghamma muddha–-kammāditoti-kiṁ? Buddhe.
anya-e1201n:309_1: aggino, aggissa, daddhino daddhissa, bhikkhuno, bhikkhussa, sayambhuno, sayambhussa–-kathaṁ?’Yo vā sisso mahāmune’ti.
anya-e1201n:313_1: aagginā aggismā daddhinā, daddhismā, bhikkhunā, bhikkhusmā, sayambhunā, sayambhusmā.
anya-e1201n:315_0: Lato yonaṁ vo hoti vā palliṅge;
anya-e1201n:317_0: Jantvādito yonaṁ no hoti vo ca vā pulliṅge;
anya-e1201n:317_1: jantuno, jantavo, jantuyo, gotrabhuno, gotrabhuvo, gotrabhaa, sahabhuno, sahabhuvo, sahabhu.
anya-e1201n:319_0: Kuppaccayantato yonaṁ no vā hoti pulliṅge;
anya-e1201n:319_1: viduno, vidū, viññuno, viñña, sabbaññuno, sabbañña.
anya-e1201n:321_0: Amusaddato yonaṁ lopova hoti pulliṅge; amū pumetveva-amuyo,amūni; vo’pavādā’yaṁ.
anya-e1201n:323_0: Amusmā sassa no na hoti; amussa, noti-kiṁ? Amuyā.
anya-e1201n:325_0: Yonaṁ lope nisuva dīgho hoti; aṭṭhi, aṭṭhīni; yolopa nisūti-kiṁ? Rattiyo.
anya-e1201n:327_0: Esu nāmassa dīgho hoti; aggīsu, aggīnaṁ, aggīhani.
anya-e1201n:329_1: pañcasu, pañcannaṁ, pañcahi, chasu, channa, chahi; evaṁ yāva aṭṭhārasā.
anya-e1201n:331_1: guṇavantā, guṇavantaṁ, guṇavante, guṇavantena, iccādi–-yvādoti-kiṁ? Guṇavā tiṭṭhati. Amussā-ma.
anya-e1201n:333_0: Aṁsesu ntappaccayayassa ṭa hoti vā ntussa ci;’ yaṁ yaṁ hirāja bhajati sataṁ vā yadi vā asaṁ’’ kiccāni kubbassa kareyya kiccaṁ’’himavaṁca pabbataṁ’,’sujāti manto’pi ajātimassa’ yogavibhāgenāññatrāpi’cakkhumā andhitā honti’’ vaggumudātīriyā pana bhikkhū vaṇṇavā honti.’
anya-e1201n:335_0: Jhasaññassa issa yosu vā ṭa hoti pulliṅge;aggaso aggī–-jhaggahaṇaṁ kiṁ?
anya-e1201n:335_1: Ikārantasamudāyassa ṭo mā siyātirattiyo; iggahaṇaṁ kiṁ? Daṇḍino; puveti-kiṁ; aṭṭhi.
anya-e1201n:337_1: bhikkhave, bhikkhavo, vevosūti-kiṁ?Cantuyo; uggahaṇaṁ kiṁ; sayambhuvo.
anya-e1201n:339_0: Yomhī kvaci lasaññassa vā ṭa hoti;
anya-e1201n:339_1: hetayo,’nandanti taṁ kurayo dassanena ajjeva taṁ kurayo pāpayātu’ vāti-kiṁ hetuyo.
anya-e1201n:341_0: Lasaññato uto yossālapane vevo honti vā pulliṅge;
anya-e1201n:343_0: Nāmasmā paresaṁ smāhisminnaṁ mhābhimhi vā honti yathā kkamaṁ;

anya-e1201n:619_0: Apañcamiyā yonaṁhisvapādādo vattamānānaṁ padasmā paresaṁ ekavākye ṭhitānaṁ tumhaamhasaddānaṁ savibhattīnaṁ vo no honti vā yathākkamaṁ;
anya-e1201n:619_1: tiṭṭhatha vo, tiṭṭhatha tumhe; tiṭṭhāma no, tiṭṭhāma mayaṁ; passati vo, passati tumhe; passati no, passatiamhe; dīyate vo, dīyate tumhaṁ; dīyate no,
anya-e1201n:620_0: Dīyate amhaṁ; dhanaṁ vo, dhanaṁ tumhaṁ; dhanaṁ no, dhanaṁ amhaṁ; kataṁ vo, kataṁ tumhehi;
anya-e1201n:620_1: kataṁ no, kataṁ amhehi–-apañcamyāti-kiṁ?Nissaṭaṁ tumhehi, nissaṭaṁ amhehi; apādādotveva
anya-e1201n:623_1: ekavākyetveva- devadatto tiṭṭhati gāme, tumhe tiṭṭhathanagare;
anya-e1201n:623_2: savibhattīnaṁtveva- arahati dhammo tumhādinaṁ; arahati dhammo amhādisānaṁ.
anya-e1201n:625_0: Nāmhi se ca apādādo vattamānānaṁ padasmā paresaṁ eka vākye ṭhitānaṁ tumhaambhasaddānaṁ savibhattīnaṁ teme vā honti yathākkamaṁ; kataṁ te, kataṁ tayā; kataṁme, kataṁ mayā; dīyate te, dīyate tava; dīyate me, dīyayate mama;
anya-e1201n:627_1: gāmo tumhaṁ pariggaho, atho janapado vo pariggaho.
anya-e1201n:629_0: Vijjamānapubbasmā paṭhamantā paresaṁ tumhaamhasaddānamā desā vā honti anvādese’pi;
anya-e1201n:629_1: gāme paṭo tumhākaṁ, atho nagare kambalo vo; atho nagare kambalo tumhākaṁ; sapubbāti-kiṁ?
anya-e1201n:629_3: paṭha mantāti-kiṁ-paṭo nagare tumhākaṁ, atho kambalo gāme vo.
anya-e1201n:631_1: gāmo tava ca pariggaho, mama ca pariggaho;
anya-e1201n:631_2: gāmo tava vā pariggaho, mama vā pariggaho;
anya-e1201n:631_4: gāmo tavāha pariggaho, mamāha parigga ho;
anya-e1201n:631_7: Gāmoca te pariggaho, nagarañca me pariggaho.
anya-e1201n:633_0: Dassanatthesu ālocanavajjitesu payujjamānesu tumha amhasaddānamādesā na honti;
anya-e1201n:633_1: gāmo tumhe uddissāgato, gāmo amhe uddissāgato–-anālocaneti-kiṁ?
anya-e1201n:633_2: Gāmo vo āloveti, gāmo no āloceti.
anya-e1201n:635_0: Āmantaṇaṁ pubbamavijjamānaṁ viya hoti tumhaamhasaddāna mādesavisaye;

anya-e1201n:635_2: pubbanti-kiṁ?’Mayetaṁ sabba makkhātaṁ tumhākaṁ dvijapuṅgavā’ parassa hi [ ] avijjamānantā apādādoti-paṭisedhona siyā? Ivāti-kiṁ? Savanaṁ[ ] yathā siyā.
anya-e1201n:637_0: Samānādhikaraṇe parato sāmaññavacanamāmantaṇamasantaṁ viya na hoti;

anya-e1201n:640_0: Iti moggallāne vyākaraṇe vuttiyaṁ syādikaṇḍo dutiyo.

anya-e1201n:747_0: Asaṁkhyehi saṁkhyāhi ca parāya aṅgulyā samāsanto ahoti no ce aññapadatthe asaṁkhyattheva samāso vattite.’Niggatamaṅgulīhi’ niraṅgulaṁ; accaṅgulaṁ;
